item.title: Senator Ruben Gallego Has Three Words for Democrats
item.description: Lessons from a Democrat who won in a Republican state.

item.title: Prison Guard Convicted in Fatal Beating Caught on Video, With 2 Acquitted
item.description: Footage of a group of guards punching, choking and stomping Robert L. Brooks ignited an outcry. Six guards pleaded guilty to charges.

item.title: For Alaskan Evacuees, Home Is Gone, With No Return in Sight
item.description: Their communities devastated from last weekend’s storm, many are in shelters in Anchorage and facing life in a completely different world.

item.title: Peanut Allergies Have Plummeted in Children, Study Shows
item.description: Doctors have long recommended that infants avoid peanuts. But in 2017, experts officially reversed that guidance, and food allergies decreased sharply...

item.title: Amazon’s AWS Disruption Creates Outages for Hundreds of Websites for Hours
item.description: Amazon Web Services, a major provider of cloud services, said most of its clients were back online. Hulu, Snapchat, Venmo and the British government w...
